title: ISC Bind - Details
description: This dashboards provides details of the Query , Query-Errors, Network, Lame-Servers, Notify and Security logs.

definition.content:
This dashboard offers granular view of your ISC BIND DNS operations by tracking important DNS logs related to queries, query errors, lame servers, notify messages, network activity, and security events.

This holistic approach provides a detailed breakdown of DNS requests and failures, helping to identify misconfigurations, communication flow, and potential threats helping maintain a secure DNS infrastructure.

For more information, see the [ISC Bind Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/isc_bind).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
